disclaimer.description_html: By signing up via text, you agree to receive recurring automated marketing messages, including cart reminders, at the phone number provided. Consent is not a condition of purchase. Reply STOP to unsubscribe. Reply HELP for help. Message frequency varies. Msg & data rates may apply. View our %{privacy_policy_link} and %{terms_of_service_link}.

unsubscribe.description: You won’t receive any more cart reminders from us.

payment.subscription_agreement_label_html: I understand that I'm agreeing to a subscription. It will renew at the price and frequency listed until it ends or is cancelled.

payment.technical_error: Payments can’t be processed right now because of a technical issue. Try again in a few minutes.

payment_errors.credit_card_processing: Your payment can’t be processed for technical reasons. Try again in a few minutes or use a different payment method.

fraud_payment_errors.address_mismatch: Street address and postal code do not match.

payment_errors.generic_error: There was an issue processing your payment. Try again or use a different payment method.

payment_errors.order_total_changed: Your order total has changed. Refresh your cart and try again.
payment_errors.pay_later_failed: There was an error processing your payment with Pay later. Choose another payment method and try again.
payment_errors.payment_processing: Your payment can’t be processed for technical reasons. Try again or use a different payment method.

payment_errors.paypal_invalid_token: PayPal wasn't available. Try again or use a different checkout option.

payment_errors.rejected_transaction: Your payment has been declined. Try again or with a different payment method.

payment_errors.three_d_secure_failed_duplicate: The credit card's 3D Secure authentication failed because another is already in progress.
payment_errors.three_d_secure_throttled: Too many attempts; please wait before trying again

processing.you_will_receive_confirmation: We’re getting a lot of orders right now. You should receive confirmation by email or text soon. If you don't receive it in the next hour, let us know.

shipping_errors.shipping_method: Your cart has been updated and the previous shipping rate isn’t valid. Select a new rate.

shipping_method_not_available_generic.one: This order can’t be shipped to your location. Contact the store for more information.
shipping_method_not_available_generic.other: Some items in your cart don’t ship to your location. Contact the store for more information.

shipping_method_not_available_updated.other: One or more items you added don’t ship to your location. Remove them to check out, or contact the store.
